attributes.description: Search for the existence of a specified mutex; edit the object_name to adjust the search. Malware families commonly define mutexes to prevent reinfection. These mutexes can be obtained from threat reports or reverse-engineered malware samples and used to find compromised hosts in your fleet.
attributes.query: SELECT object_name, object_type, session_id FROM winbaseobj WHERE object_type == "Mutant" AND object_name LIKE '%InsertMutex_Here%'
